entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is still fighting, dueling three at once: Hermione, Ginny, and Luna. She is equal to them and Harry's attention is diverted as a Killing Curse shot close to Ginny.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is Bellatrix's master and she dueled three at once like him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the three girls battling against Bellatrix, along with Ginny and Luna.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is one of the three girls battling against Bellatrix, along with Hermione and Luna. She narrowly escapes death from a Killing Curse shot by Bellatrix.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is one of the three girls battling against Bellatrix, along with Hermione and Ginny.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's attention is diverted as a Killing Curse shot close to Ginny, and he changes course to run at Bellatrix rather than Voldemort.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley throws off her cloak and runs towards Bellatrix, shouting 'NOT MY DAUGHTER, YOU BITCH!' and begins to duel with her.

entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: Bellatrix Lestrange is the one being fought by Mrs. Weasley and the three girls, Hermione, Ginny, and Luna.

relationships.description: Bellatrix is Voldemort's master, as mentioned in the text: 'like her master she dueled three at once'.
Harry changes course to run at Bellatrix rather than Voldemort, indicating that he is targeting her.
Mrs. Weasley throws off her cloak and runs towards Bellatrix, shouting 'NOT MY DAUGHTER, YOU BITCH!' and begins to duel with her.
Hermione is one of the three girls battling against Bellatrix, along with Ginny and Luna.
Ginny is one of the three girls battling against Bellatrix, along with Hermione and Luna. She narrowly escapes death from a Killing Curse shot by Bellatrix.
Luna is one of the three girls battling against Bellatrix, along with Hermione and Ginny.
